summary: The agent provided information about Contoso Wireless televisions, including their top-of-the-line technology, variety of sizes and styles, and payment options such as credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and financing. The agent also explained the return policy, which allows customers to return products within 30 days for a full refund minus shipping and handling fees, as well as the manufacturer's warranty that covers any defects or malfunctions for up to one year from the date of purchase.
